name: Humaaans Illustrations
description:
A collection of customizable illustrations of people inspired by work, movement, and colors!


All the doodles in this project were made with Blush, which means that you can customize them however you want!


All the humans work like building blocks made of vector arms, legs, and hairstyles. Mix elements to create different characters and scenes.


Install the Blush plugin so you can customize everything.
